feed.title: theme.park Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Deprecated docker builds for armv7

Other Changes

  • Sonarr, Radarr, Readarr Favicons by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/650
  • fix qbittorrent unthemed elements by @arminius-smh in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/659
  • Add RosÃ© Pine theme by @juliamertz in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/661
  • Update unraid-base.css for Unraid 7 by @pnancke in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/665
  • Develop by @GilbN in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/668

New Contributors

  • @arminius-smh made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/659
  • @juliamertz made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/661
  • @pnancke made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/665

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.19.1...1.20.0

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.20.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed

  • Unraid login addon:
  • Fixed broken video URL to preferred domain
  • Unraid Fallout Addon: video scaling fix
  • Audiobookshelf: Updated Audiobookshelf CSS

New Contributors

  • @KaHooli made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/676

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.20.0...1.20.1

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.21.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixes

  • Fixes broken qbittorrent mod logic when sed'ing the config file. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/690

Resolves #688 Resolves #657

New Contributors

  • @CLHatch made their first contribution in https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/pull/690

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.21.0...1.21.1

entry.title: New release for theme.park: 1.21.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixes

  • qBittorrent mod: Validate that the config file exist. Fix for #684
  • qBittorent base: Remove !important from .dynamicTable th. Fixes QBittorrent Column Sort Icons vanished #671
  • servarr base: Remove ProgressBar-purple override. Fix for #646

Full Changelog: https://github.com/themepark-dev/theme.park/compare/1.21.1...1.21.2
